text: Her sutelaþ on þisse cristesboc þa forewardan þe þe prior on baþan & ealle þa gebroþran habbaþ gemaked wið sæwi & wiþ þeodgyfu his wif.
Þæt is þæt we habbaþ heom geunnen of godes healf & of sancte <marian> & of sancte petres & of ure þa broþerræddene & þa bedræddene for life & for deþe.
And gelænd heom þæt land of þære stræt þe ure wæs heore hus on to rymende þa hwile þe hi libbeþ.
And hi us þar togenes gifeþ þæt hi us hyrsumien wylleþ & holde beon, mid eallan þam þe hi magan & cunnen.
And æfter heore tweire dæie sæwies & þeodgyfe hi gyfeþ heore hus & heore land & ure criste & sancte petre to þam þæt me hi fægere underfo & holdlice for heore sawla beo.
Her is to gewitnesse Osward preost & Will þe clerec & Huga þe portgerefe & Beoring & Leoffric & Heoþewulf & Burehhard & Wylwi & Geosfræi & Ælfword þe smiþ & Edwi Scredes sune & Roðð þe frenccisce.
